law.catch_line: The enforcement and penalty provisions of Subtitle 6 of this title shall apply to a violation of thi...

text.section: The enforcement and penalty provisions of Subtitle 6 of this title shall apply to a violation of this subtitle.
Each transfer or attempted transfer of a motor vehicle or motor vehicle engine in violation of § 2-1104(b) of this subtitle shall constitute a separate violation of the provisions of this subtitle.
